Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Allows brewery supply stores to sell New York state labelled beer for off-premises consumption
Summary: Allows brewery supply stores to sell New York state labelled beer for off-premises consumption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to allowing brewery supply stores to sell beer for off premises consumption
